DOC.brief_summary: We propose conduct pilot trial Internet-only depression skill train program adolescent young adult . The intervention , MoodHelper.org already exist test two pilot . In third pilot , plan use enriched minority sample frame mail 3,000 6,000 invitational brochure KPNW member age 14 24 , enrollment target 150 . Interested member go study Internet site , choose participate , complete online consent assessment battery ( use previous pilot ) . Participants randomly assign site ’ software one two condition : ( 1 ) “ Intervention ” condition , complete access SADhelper.org web site ( 2 ) `` Usual Care ” condition , access Internet sit KPNW health care , access therapeutic portion SADhelper site . All participant ( without access research intervention ) remind e-mail , necessary , telephone return web site complete follow-up questionnaire four , eight , sixteen , thirty-two week enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Self-Help Depression Skills Program College-Aged Youth
DOC.detailed_description: We propose conduct pilot trial Internet-only depression skill train program adolescent young adult . The intervention , MoodHelper.org already exist test two pilot . In third pilot , plan use enriched minority sample frame mail 3,000 6,000 invitational brochure KPNW member age 14 24 , enrollment target 150 . Interested member go study Internet site , choose participate , complete online consent assessment battery ( use previous pilot ) . Participants randomly assign site ’ software one two condition : ( 1 ) “ Intervention ” condition , complete access SADhelper.org web site ( 2 ) `` Usual Care ” condition , access Internet sit KPNW health care , access therapeutic portion SADhelper site . All participant ( without access research intervention ) remind e-mail , necessary , telephone return web site complete follow-up questionnaire four , eight , sixteen , thirty-two week enrol study .
DOC.criteria: current clinical diagnosis depression Internet access
